document.full_text: kyung-sook shin's novel about a selfish family's penitence amid the disappearance of its matriarch has been released in english after selling more than a million copies in south korea.
document.title: books of the times: a mother's devotion, a family's tearful regrets
lines_and_colors: kyung-sook shin's novel about a selfish family's penitence amid the disappearance of its matriarch has been released in english after selling more than a million copies in south korea.
